data.name: Kilta Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
The official soundtrack from the strategic auto battler Kilta. It features 36 tracks and 89 minutes of original music, ranging from unique character themes to energetic battle music. All music is composed by Janne Kantola except for the tracks "Balanced Battle" and "Heroic Heroes", which were composed by Joonas Muukkonen.

Available in MP3 (320 kbps) and FLAC formats.
